reuters.title: WESTON <WESTON> FILES CONVERTIBLE OFFERING
reuters.body: Roy F Weston Inc said it filed with the Securitites and Exchange Commission a registration statement covering a 30 mln dlr issue of convertible subordinated debentures due 2002. Plans for the proceeds include capital expenditures such as new office buildings, equipment and facilities, the company said. Weston also anticipates using the proceeds for possible acquisitions of related businesses as well as for general corporate purposes. Weston named Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc as sole manager of the offering. Reuter 
